transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan. Hello.
Executive: Hello ji namaskar kaise hain? Kaise hain Sharma ji namaskar.
Customer: Kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Main IndiaMART se parvez baat kar raha hu aapne na ek issue raise kiya tha jo aapne aapko guide bhi kiya hai ke usme koi hamari taraf se koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi ho raha hamare to aaj bhi wohi problem hai sir.
Executive: Ji? Abhi bhi jaise main system pe aaya hu na mujhe abhi wohi dikkat hai.
Executive: Sir humne check karwa liya hai humne check karwa liya hai yahan se koi bhi issues nahi dikh raha hai hum log ko.
Customer: Hume kya karna hai bataiye abhi main online hu bataiye are dilip.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: O dilip.
Customer: Ek minute idhar aao.
Customer: Kya karna hai aap bataiye mujhe mujhe kya karna hai? Kuch nahi aap open open kijiye open kijiye.
Customer: Haan open hai boliye.
Executive: Theek hai doctor aapka ye hai na ki OTP nahi aata kabhi kabhi hai na?
Customer: OTP nahi aata bar bar OTP kyu mang raha hai sir baat woh hai.
Executive: OTP to login karenge to mangega na sir bar bar.
Customer: Aisa thodi mangta kabhi aaj tak nahi mang raha khali mera hi mang raha hai baki kisi ke nahi mang raha hai dusre kisi system pe nahi mang raha.
Executive: Aap OTP jab login kar rahe hain to OTP mangega na sir login karenge.
Customer: Aisa thodi mangta roz ek hi system pe kar raha hai to kabhi OTP nahi mangta hai aur dusre system pe to nahi mang raha mere system pe hi kyu mang raha hai.
Executive: Log out kar rahe hain kya login karne ke sath sath kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ek second.
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan hello.
Executive: Main keh raha hu ki aap ek bar login kariye pehle abhi aap.
Customer: Main login karta hu ye dekhiye aap screen share karke karo niyat ko.
Executive: Hello. Mobile se kar rahe hain ya desktop se kar rahe hain?
Customer: Sir mobile pe dikkat nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Desktop pe hoti hai na? Hmm.
Executive: Ek bar kijiye to sahi abhi aap kijiye. Aap screen le lo na nahi to dekho to aapko pata pad jayega na kya kitni pareshani aa rahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ek video likhiye isme.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kitne system mein login hai aapka?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Kitne system mein login hai?
Customer: Do teen mein hai ya ek hi.
Executive: Chalna padega.
Customer: Dekhunga koi aaj pehli bar thodi ho raha hai.
Executive: Aapke hi desktop mein dikhega abhi.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap
Customer: Ko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing OTP issues while logging in.

Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to share screen.
- Executive put the call on hold.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, login, desktop
